tool_description: Manages volunteer training sessions including scheduling, enrollment, progress tracking, and certification.

volunteer_ids.description: List of volunteer IDs to enroll in training

training_modules.description: List of required training module names

delivery_method.description: Training delivery method: online, in_person, hybrid

error_messages: No volunteers specified: At least one volunteer ID must be provided.
Invalid training modules: One or more training modules do not exist.
Invalid delivery method: Delivery method must be online, in_person, or hybrid.
Invalid schedule preference: Schedule preference must be weekday, weekend, or evening.
Enrollment failed: Unable to enroll one or more volunteers in specified training.
usage: Provide volunteer IDs and required training modules. Optionally specify delivery method and schedule preference. The tool will enroll volunteers and track their progress.

scheduled_sessions.description: List of scheduled training session details

enrollment_confirmations.description: Enrollment confirmation IDs for each volunteer
